segments.text: We need to figure out how much money we are spending and what we are spending it on ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I think we could be saving more .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? Well . Ok . Get the receipts out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let's see . We spent 700 dollars for our home loan payment , 400 on groceries , 75 on utilities , 250 on gasoline , 100 on books and 300 on entertainment last month .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We put 500 into the savings account and 750 into our stock account .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: 3,075 . Our paychecks are 3300 combined . That means we don't have any receipts for 225 .
segments.speaker: S2
